prompts: Create a blue Pokémon known for its loud voice and big mouth.
Generate a Pokémon that excels in sound-based attacks with a playful personality.
Show me a Pokémon with a rounded body shape and large ears that can amplify sound.
Imagine a creature that thrives in urban environments and loves to make noise.
Design a Pokémon that evolves from a small noise-maker into a giant sound powerhouse.
Give me a Pokémon that has a bright pink accent and can unleash powerful sound waves.
Make a Pokémon that can be found in forests and mountains, known for its boisterous nature.
